name: Brazilian Association of Animal Protein
membership: ABPA does not belong to any other association.
goal: ABPA is a national organization composed of the Brazilian producers and exporters of poultrymeat, pigmeat and eggs. ABPA has 140 members and works for the continuous development of its industries, ensuring their quality and assisting them in reaching new markets.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Customs, Development, Enlargement, Environment, External Relations, Food Safety, Public Health, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives:
Food Information to Consumers

Country of Origin Labelling

Food safety initiatives

Animal welfare initiatives
